title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Language Educator Professional Development Program Using Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Educational Theory and Language Instruction Methodologies
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Apply gamification fundamentals (e.g., experience points, badges, leaderboards) to language lesson design
Creatively design at least three collaborative language learning activities based on the 4Ts theory
Evaluate learner engagement and motivational effects with over 80% accuracy when integrating game elements into lesson design

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
